text: \define cboard_copy(ur_text) ``` $ur_text$ ``` <> \end \define cboard_pwd(ur_text ur_pk) <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/state/popup/$ur_pk$" text="show"> <$button set="$:/state/popup/$ur_pk$" setTo="show">Show <$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/popup/$ur_pk$" text="show"> <$button set="$:/state/popup/$ur_pk$" setTo="hide">Hide ``` $ur_text$ ``` <> \end
